info.name: Health Recommendation
info.description: In this innovative project, we will develop a **backend-only Personalized Health and Wellness Recommendation System** using **Microservices, Spring Boot, JPA, API Gateway, Discovery Server, and Authentication Service**. The system aims to provide users with tailored health and wellness recommendations, facilitate progress tracking, encourage community engagement, offer nutrition information, support mental health, utilize data analytics, and provide feedback analysis.

item.name: User-service

request.description: This API is used to register a new user taking user information as input.
This API is used to Login any registered user providing email and password. It will provide the Security Token after login.
This API is used to add a user's health data in the database.

item.description: This Service will manage User Profile and Health Data
